The Slokams are chanted and there is beautiful background music to boot..

I got it physically from my friend&#039;s computer..so don&#039;t know the real source
or cannot authoritative say what they are..I guess those lyrics have a definite upanishad feel to it..Knowledgeable people please comment on what they are..
Have fun.. :-)

Plz Seed after download..
My seeding will be erratic in sense that i will be seeding only at night IST(Indian Standard Time)..and cannot do it every other day..
So if your download goes dead plz check for seeding for couple of days before hanging up..
